dutch.quote: Wie zichzelf bewaart, bewaart geen rotte appel.
dutch.translation: Those who keep themselves, don’t keep a bad apple.
dutch.meaning: You have to be careful with yourself because you are not replaceable.

dutch.quote: Zelfs de beste breister laat wel eens een steekje vallen
dutch.translation: Even the best knitter drops a stitch sometimes.
dutch.meaning: Even if someone can do something very well, he (or she) will sometimes make a mistake; that is forgivable.

dutch.quote: Aan de rand van het ravijn bloeien de mooiste bloemen.
dutch.translation: The most beautiful flowers bloom at the edge of the ravine.
dutch.meaning: Those who dare to take risks can achieve exceptional results.

dutch.quote: Alle wegen leiden naar Rome.
dutch.translation: All roads lead to Rome.
dutch.meaning: All the methods of doing something will achieve the same result in the end.

dutch.quote: Als de ene hand de ander wast worden ze allebei schoon
dutch.translation: When one hand washes the other, they both get clean.
dutch.meaning: When you work together and help each other, what has to be done gets done faster.

dutch.quote: Een goed begin is het halve werk
dutch.translation: A good start will save you work in the end.

dutch.quote: Boontje komt om zijn loontje.
dutch.translation: You will get what you deserve if you’ve done something that’s not accepted.

dutch.quote: Al doende leert men.
dutch.translation: Only by trying will you learn the skills you need.

dutch.quote: Een ezel stoot zich in het algemeen, niet twee keer aan dezelfde steen.
dutch.translation: Not even a donkey will make the same mistake twice.

dutch.quote: Als je wilt dat de kippen eieren leggen, dan moet je het kakelen verdragen.
dutch.translation: If you want to achieve something, you will have to live with both the positive and negative impact.

dutch.quote: Groene krieken worden rood, kleine kinders worden groot
dutch.translation: Green cherries turn red, small children grow up.
dutch.meaning: Everything can change.

dutch.quote: Met je hoed in de hand kom je door het ganse land.
dutch.translation: With your hand in hand, you’ll go through the entire country.
dutch.meaning: You can accomplish more by being polite and kind.

dutch.quote: Onbekend maakt onbemind
dutch.translation: Unknown makes unloved.
dutch.meaning: People tend to be scared of what they don’t know or understand.

dutch.quote: Oost, west, thuis best
dutch.translation: East, west, home best.
dutch.meaning: There’s no place like home.

dutch.quote: Als de kalveren op het ijs dansen
dutch.translation: “When the calves dance on the ice” or “When pigs fly”

dutch.quote: Acht is meer dan duizend
dutch.translation: Eight is more than thousand
dutch.meaning: Every little thing helps

dutch.quote: Wat er ook gebeurt, altijd blijven lachen
dutch.translation: Whatever happens, do not stop laughing
dutch.meaning: Do not lose hope.

dutch.quote: “Het is nog geen avond”, zei de kraaienvanger.
dutch.translation: It is not night yet, said the crow catcher.
dutch.meaning: Do not lose faith. As long as it is not night yet, you can still catch the crows.

dutch.quote: Achter de dikste gordijnen wordt het hardste gehuild
dutch.translation: Behind the thickest curtains are the loudest cries
dutch.meaning: Do not let the richness of others full you; happiness does not equal money.

dutch.quote: Zonder wrijving, geen glans
dutch.translation: Without friction, no shine.
dutch.meaning: Without any effort, you will not reach the best possible result.

dutch.quote: De een scheert schapen, de ander varkens
dutch.translation: One shears sheep, the other pigs
dutch.meaning: The world isn't fair

dutch.quote: Men moet zich krommen, wil men door de wereld kommen
dutch.translation: Hard work pays off
dutch.meaning: You need to work hard to get something in this world.

dutch.quote: De hond in de pot vinden
dutch.translation: Dining with Duke Humphrey
dutch.meaning: Being too late to diner

dutch.quote: De omgekeerde wereld
dutch.translation: The world turned upside down, topsy turvy
dutch.meaning: The opposite of what is logical and trusted

dutch.quote: Jong geleerd, oud gedaan
dutch.translation: What learned in the cradle, is carried to the tomb
dutch.meaning: What you learn in your youth, will become useful in your adult life.

dutch.quote: Wat gij niet wilt dat u geschiedt, doet dat ook de ander niet.
dutch.translation: What you do not want to be done to you, do not do to others.
dutch.meaning: Do not wish on others what you would not wish on yourself.

dutch.quote: Achter de wolken schijnt de zon.
dutch.translation: Behind the clouds the sun shines.
dutch.meaning: All bad things are temporary and then it gets better.

dutch.quote: Als er een schaap over de dam is, volgen er meer
dutch.translation: If one sheep crosses the ditch, more will follow.
dutch.meaning: If one person has tried something new, others dare to do it too

dutch.quote: Blaffende honden bijten niet.
dutch.translation: Barking dogs don't bite.
dutch.meaning: Those who shout the loudest are the least dangerous.

dutch.quote: Beter een vogel in de hand dan tien in de lucht.
dutch.translation: Better one bird in the hand than ten in the air.
dutch.meaning: Better a little than none at all / small concrete results are better than big plans.

world.quote: 고생 끝에 낙이 온다 – Go-saeng kkeut-e nag-i on-da
world.translation: At the end of hardship comes happiness.
world.meaning: It means that happiness and good things will happen after experiencing difficult or hard work.

world.quote: A lo hecho, pecho.
world.translation: To what’s done, chest.
world.meaning: What’s done is done. You’ve made your bed, now lie in it. When something bad has happened it’s too late to change it, you need to just face up to it.

world.quote: Den som vågar han vinner.
world.translation: He who dares wins.
world.meaning: If one has the courage and audacity to take risks, that person will succeed in life.

world.quote: La vida no es un camino de rosa
world.translation: Life is not a path of roses.
world.meaning: It's normal to encounter all kinds of difficulties along the road of life.

world.quote: Aquí no es Bueno el que ayuda, sino el que no jode
world.translation: Here the one that helps is no good, but the one that doesn’t disturbs.
world.meaning: Sometimes it’s better to step away from a stressful situation, or else you will only get in the way. Know when you are not needed.

world.quote: Du må ikke kaste sten når du selv bor i glashus
world.translation: Those who live in glass houses should not throw stones.
world.meaning: If you can’t handle criticism on yourself, you shouldn’t give it to others either.

world.quote: In bocca al lupo
world.translation: Into the mouth of a wolf.
world.meaning: Good luck! (like ‘’break a leg’’).

world.quote: Pagar o pato
world.translation: Pay the duck.
world.meaning: Taking the blame for something you didn’t do.

world.quote: Sauter du coq à l'âne
world.translation: Jump from the chicken to the donkey
world.meaning: Illogically jumping between conversation topics.

world.quote: Chodit kolem horké kaše
world.translation: Walk around in hot porridge.
world.meaning: To beat around the bush.

world.quote: פול גז בניוטרל
world.translation: Full gas in neutral.
world.meaning: You're making a lot of noise but ain't getting nowhere.

world.quote: Te tiro atu to kanohi ki tairawhiti ana tera whiti te ra kite ataata ka hinga ki muri kia koe.
world.translation: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows will fall behind you.
world.meaning: Look at the bright side of things and ignore fear and negative thoughts.

world.quote: Two wrongs don’t make a right
world.translation: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows will fall behind you.
world.meaning: It is not acceptable to do something bad towards someone, just because they did something bad to you first.

world.quote: Die Nacht spült, was der Tag eingeseift hat
world.translation: The night rinses what the day has soaped.
world.meaning: The worries of the day are washed away by the nighttime.

world.quote: A monkey in silk is a monkey no less.
world.translation: No matter what someone wears, they are still the same person underneath.
world.meaning: No matter what someone wears, they are still the same person underneath.

world.quote: 请教别⼈⼀次是五分钟的傻⼦， 从不请教别⼈是⼀辈⼦的傻⼦
world.translation: He who asks a question is a fool for five minutes; he who does not ask a question remains a fool forever.
world.meaning: Be curious and ask questions about what you don’t know.

world.quote: Nana korobi ya ok
world.translation: Fall down seven times, stand up eight.
world.meaning: Fall down seven times, stand up eight.

world.quote: Actions speak louder than words
world.translation: Emphasize that what you do is more important and shows your intentions and feelings more clearly than what you say.
world.meaning: Emphasize that what you do is more important and shows your intentions and feelings more clearly than what you say.

world.quote: Isihlahla saziwa ngezithelo zaso
world.translation: A tree is known by its fruit
world.meaning: The meaning is that a person’s success is shown by his or her deeds.

world.quote: La vérité vaut bien qu'on passe quelques années sans la trouver
world.translation: A tree is known by its fruit
world.meaning: Truth is more valuable if it takes you a few years to find it.

world.quote: Flat out like a lizard drinking
world.translation: Someone is very busy
world.meaning: Someone is very busy

world.quote: Er bestaan geen blunders, alleen leermomenten
world.translation: There is no easy way to learn
world.meaning: You will learn from your mistakes

world.quote: Hvis du vil behandle mennesker lige, skal du gøre det på forskellige måder.
world.translation: If you want to treat people equally, you have to do this in different ways
world.meaning: Everybody is different, and we should treat each other as equals. But we have to take that persons vulnerabilities into account

world.quote: Ich verstehe nur Bahnhof.
world.translation: NL ENG: ‘Dit is Chinees voor mij” “It’s Greek to me
world.meaning: Someone does not understand something or ask to change the subject.

world.quote: Eteenpäin sanoi mummo lumessa
world.translation: Forward, said Granny in the snow
world.meaning: Keep going through difficulties with determination.

world.quote: Bí abá so òkò sójà ará ilé eni ní bá.
world.translation: He who throws a stone in the market will hit his relative.
world.meaning: Be careful what you do unto others it may return towards you or someone close to you.

world.quote: Bom é saber calar, até a hora de falar
world.translation: It is good to know how to keep quiet until it is time to speak.
world.meaning: Sometimes it is better to not speak up.

world.quote: Obanyansofoo yebu no be, yennka no asem.
world.translation: The wise is spoken to in proverbs, not plain language.
world.meaning: This proverb is also used to indicate that one is expected to learn from his circumstances and the experiences of others.

world.quote: “ปดทองหลงพระ” (“Pid tong lang pra.)
world.translation: Putting a gold leaf on the back of the Buddha image.
world.meaning: Doing something good without seeking attention.

world.quote: مساحة ضيقة تبدو واسعة لضيق الفق
world.translation: A narrow space looks wide to the narrow-minded.
world.meaning: Everyone has their own point of view.
